scripts.dev: rm -rf build && mkdir build && cp -r plugin/viewer/fonts build/fonts && cp plugin/viewer/index.html build/index.html && ./bin/pathfinder && cp ./.pathfinder/graph.json ./build/graph.json && esbuild ./plugin/viewer/index.ts --bundle --watch --outdir=build --minify --servedir=build
scripts.build:viewer: mkdir -p dist/viewer && cp plugin/viewer/index.html dist/viewer/index.html && cp -r plugin/viewer/fonts dist/viewer/fonts && esbuild ./plugin/viewer/index.ts --bundle --outfile=./dist/viewer/index.js --minify --external:*graph.json
scripts.bundle: rm -rf dist && npm run build:parser && npm run build:viewer && npm run build:server
